pullrequest.title: Expanding the functionality of the plugin framework, and introducing PluginPtr and specializations

content.raw:
`make coverage` is hanging for this branch with ign-cmake 0.5.0 ([ign-cmake issue 25](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/issues/25/branch-coverage-causing-make-coverage-to))

I've reduced the pipeline timeout to 10 minutes

we could also consider build ign-cmake 0.4.1 from source in the pipeline until this is fixed
content.html:
make coverage is hanging for this branch with ign-cmake 0.5.0 (ign-cmake issue 25)

I've reduced the pipeline timeout to 10 minutes

we could also consider build ign-cmake 0.4.1 from source in the pipeline until this is fixed
